Review_Summary: Ponmani is best grinder company.  very good product and good support provided by company. I give 10 star to Ponmani Grinder Company.

Just grated coconuts and if you get the knack is super fast. Roller stones are good. Heavy duty grinder so am sure will do the job. 2 litres is ideal and after grinding will know how quick it is. My old one is Santha and that was an amazing ginder. In about 20 odd years only once went for a small repair. Looks like this will also do the same job as efficiently.
The product matches its description and the performance has been very good till date. It is a simple and efficient Grinder without any fancy stuff. The delivery and packing was good.
Ponmani grinder is very very nice I loved it worth fr a price ????
